content:
Though I'd love to go with <color=#ca8f50>{me}</color>,
cleaning up the Camp is important too...

By the time you're back with all the branches,
you'll find a squeaky clean Camp waiting for you!
This tea party actually gave me such a wonderful sense of community! It feels so nice when everyone works together toward a common goal!

A new environment - better watch out for getting lost.
But if it's <color=#ca8f50>{me}</color>,
I'll be totally fine~

While looking for the campsite earlier,
I saw quite a few branches on the ground.
If that's not enough, Mobai said we can shake the trees~
